summary: This is a command file that adds several items such as armors, weapons and more
descriptionHtml:
This mod is a simple .txt command file that adds the following items to your character and modifies all the attributes aswell.

- All Shouts
- All Perks
- All Skills level 100

 +500 Health
 + 500 Magicka
 + 500 Stamina
 + 500 Carryweight
 + 10000000 Gold

- Daedric Sword of Storms
- Daedric Sword of Inferno
- Daedric Armor
- Daedric Boots
- Daedric Gauntlets
- Daedric Helmet
- Daedric Shield

- Azura\'s Star
- Skeleton Key

- Philter of Enhanced Stamina
- Philter of Health
- Philter of Lasting Potency
- Philter of Regeneration
- Philter of Vigor
- Prime Elixir of Escape
- Prime Elixir of Plunder

Installation:

Once downloaded the file, place it in your Skyrim directory (NOT the Data directory) then boot up your save and press \"\\\" (Usually below the Esc button) and type: 
bat cheat1
author: Demonyze
